## ScrollAdaptorProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ScrollAdaptorProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dampingFactor?](./controls.scrolladaptorprops.dampingfactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.5 |
|  [scrollElement](./controls.scrolladaptorprops.scrollelement.md) | HTMLElement | Long DOM Element to observe |
|  [scrollParent?](./controls.scrolladaptorprops.scrollparent.md) | HTMLElement | <i>(Optional)</i> Scroll element's parent, to gather scroll values from. Defaults to window |
